## AsyncTapHook.tapPromise() method

listen to hook in async promise mode

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tapPromise(fn: IPromiseTapCallback<T, R | void>, bucket?: IHookBucketType): ITapDestroy;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | <code>IPromiseTapCallback&lt;T, R &#124; void&gt;</code> | Listener callback When tapping success, return resolved promise. Otherwise, throw error or return rejected promise. |
|  bucket | <code>IHookBucketType</code> | Listen to specified hashcode bucket |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ITapDestroy`

The unTap function
